Dam is in line 34: **Hellenistic**, by English Channel. 2 wins at 3, 14,690 Euro, in Ireland; winner at 4, $58,972, in N.A./U.S., 2nd Suffolk Downs Distaff Turf S.-R (SUF, $15,000). Set ncr at Gulfstream Park, 1 3/16 miles in 1:53.19 (03/12/15). Sent from United States to Ireland in 2013. Returned to United States from Ireland in 2014. (Total: $79,132).
